lines: I, too, have once checked out volume eleven of the Articles of Halonic Polity. When I went to return it, however, I had the misfortune of being spotted by one of our most conservative seniors.
After being reprimanded for hours on how “the far-fetched notions penned within corrupt the mind,” I shan't be caught dead with it again.

Kidnapped... I scarce believe it, even now. Thank the Fury she was found uninjured! <sigh> Sadly, not everyone is so relieved to hear the good news. I suggest you avoid him, over by the bookshelves, lest you also be forced to endure a lengthy speech on the dangers of welcoming separatists back into the school.
